review_data.title: Perfect summer apero location
review_data.content: Great spot to grab an afterwork drink, especially in the summer. Due to its location, the Campo has a ton of sun light late into the summer evening. Perfect to catch some sun and enjoy some drinks. Easy going crowd, good choice of drinks
